item.title: MIUI V12.0.4.0.QJXINXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 9 Pro Max India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 9 Pro Max India

Codename: excalibur

Version: V12.0.4.0.QJXINXM | 10.0

Size: 3.1 GB

MD5: 933f5d8da9799742911d8ac19ea224c4

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off
